title: Odd lag, thinking its my internet
body: My ping and fps are perfectly fine. Once minions spawn everything starts rubber banding while my ping and fps are fine. I can play aram , but certain champs cause this lag, like MF ult and illaoi ult. My connection is currently being throttled to 128kpbs, is this the problem? Is there something I can do? Besides get better internet

replies.body:
Not sure if you're still around, the 2nd game ran smoothly up until MF ulted. I ran the log reader, my results

average ping: 88, highest 142 (no problems here) packet loss 2.54%.

I'm assuming it's cause my data is throttled to 128kbps. Are there any options ingame I can tweak to help this?

Thanks for following up and taking the time to gather that info.  Our tech team can look into this further for you and provide some options.  [Submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and attach any of the information and details provided here.  You can also link this thread if you'd like.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as possible and help get this resolved for good.

Thank you for the quick reply, i've always loved Riot support. I started to do the repair on the client but canceled part way through. I tried to do the Log Reader but I think it wanted to check my recent games, all my recent ones were at my friends house. So I started up a game, I turned shadows off, disabled eye candy and turned sound off. Game ran smooth, running my 2nd test game now.

It sounds like your network is suffering from some packet loss and causing the rubber band or delay that you're seeing.  We can take a closer look at what's going on by running this [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  It should automatically provide some results of what's going wrong and steps towards resolving it.  Let me know what you come up or if the issue persists!
Just an update, i'm assuming it's packet loss. I've done research and quite a few people say they are able to play on this connection without problems. Wondering why mine messes up
